title: Multiple Offers| Sense HQ | Omio | INDMoney
content:
**Compensation Details**


Education: B.Tech in ECE from Tier-1 College
Years of Experience: 2yrs 6 months
Prior Experience: One of the top Investment Bank
Date of offer: Feb 2025
Prev comp: 26L Base 7L Bonus ~33 L

1. Company: Sense
Title: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 38,00,000
Relocation bonus: None
Stock bonus: ~45 L ESPOS (vested equally over 4 yrs)
Joining Bonus : 2L
Performance Bonus : 10% ~ 3.8L 
Total Comp (Salary + Bonus): 28L + 2L + 3.8L = 43.8L (1st Yr) (excluding ESOPs)


2. Company: Omio
Title: Senior Backend Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 42,00,000
Relocation bonus: None
Stock bonus: ~12 L ESPOS (vested equally over 4 yrs)
Joining Bonus : 3L
Performance Bonus : None
Total Comp (Salary + Bonus): 42L + 3L = 45L (1st Yr) (excluding ESOPs)


3. Company: INDMoney
Title: Senior Backend Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 32,00,000
Relocation bonus: None
Stock bonus: ~12 L ESPOS (vested equally over 4 yrs)
Joining Bonus : None
Performance Bonus : 3.2L
Total Comp (Salary + Bonus): 32L + 3.2L = 35L (1st Yr) (excluding ESOPs)
Rejected offer due to maximum cash component they gave was only around 36L and 5 days work from office

**Please help me decide !!**
